amendment.description: To provide that land may be acquired for inclusion in the Camp Amache National Historic Site only by exchange.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4926 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4926 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Bennet. (consideration: CR S676; text: CR S676) To provide that land may be acquired for inclusion in the Camp Amache National Historic Site only by exchange.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4926 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Bennet.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4926 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
